item.title: Pupil Dilation
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:273013”]I wonder if you can make your pupils smaller if they are diluted because of drugs…

Could be helpful when dealing with parents/authorities.[/quote]Focus intently on something close to you, the links on the side of my youtube video work.

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:1, topic:273106”]What is this? Are you trying to make your pupil bigger or something? Sorry for my tardness.[/quote]Yeah, if you look closely you can see it. My camera phone’s quality isn’t that great but I think it’s noticeable?

Read full topic

item.title: Pupil Dilation
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:9, topic:273013”]I do this all the time, I never realised what it actually does to your pupil. Its the eyes way on controlling the amount of light that enters your retina.
The best way is to Dilate your Pupil is to stare into nothing in the dark and then suddenly look at a bright light.[/quote]

Yeah but with this method you can dilate them in direct light

Read full topic

The best way is to Dilate your Pupil is to stare into nothing in the dark and then suddenly look at a bright light.

item.title: Pupil Dilation
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

jme:

Well, I find ecstasy makes mine huge and I think I could try it on that. Tripping would be terrible anyways I’d need more then small pupils to get away with it.

Wear dark sunglasses. Sure you wont look like a stoner.

Read full topic

item.title: Pupil Dilation
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:6, topic:273013”][quote author=jme link=topic=360350.msg2746167#msg2746167 date=1239644816]
I wonder if you can make your pupils smaller if they are diluted because of drugs…

Could be helpful when dealing with parents/authorities.
[/quote]
Yes! That is what I was thinking. But when you’re tripping how do you focus your eyes in order to constrict them? I can do it when I’m sober, but not high. Maybe I need more practice.[/quote]

Well, I find ecstasy makes mine huge and I think I could try it on that. Tripping would be terrible anyways I’d need more then small pupils to get away with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Pupil Dilation
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:273013”]I wonder if you can make your pupils smaller if they are diluted because of drugs…

Could be helpful when dealing with parents/authorities.[/quote]
Yes! That is what I was thinking. But when you’re tripping how do you focus your eyes in order to constrict them? I can do it when I’m sober, but not high. Maybe I need more practice.
